author: Timothy B. Lee
title: Ford aims to resume production in less than three weeks despite pandemic
description: GM and Fiat Chrysler haven't announced plans to restart production.
content:
4 with 4 posters participating
A week after Ford shuttered its North American factories over coronavirus concerns, the Detroit automaker says it is aiming to re-open some of those factories in April. Specifically, Ford plans to test the waters by operating a… [+1187 chars]
